messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Where are the unschooling conferences??
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: leebowensfamily@yahoo.com Hi, I was wondering if anyone knew of any unschooling conferences in MA, RI, NH, VT, CT areas (anything New England or NY).
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: leebowensfamily@...

Hi, I was wondering if anyone knew of any unschooling
conferences in MA, RI, NH, VT, CT areas (anything New
England or NY). I know of one in MA that is usually in
Peabody, MA, but I have heard that they are not having
it this year. I know of another in NC or SC but that
is *way* too far for me. Thanks!! Heather L.


-=-=-=-=-

Well, NC isn't nearly as far as last year's in Albuquerque, NM! <g>

But the closest to you would probably be the Toronto conference
http://livingjoyfully.ca/conference/ hosted by Pam Larricchia.

But there's a large crowd coming down to NC from the northeast. Maybe
tag along!

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org
